org.xbill.DNS
Class Record

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.xbill.DNS.Record
Direct Known Subclasses:
A6Record, AAAARecord, ARecord, CERTRecord, HINFORecord, KEYRecord, LOCRecord, MX_KXRecord, NS_CNAME_PTRRecord, NXTRecord, OPTRecord, RPRecord, SIGRecord, SOARecord, SRVRecord, TKEYRecord, TSIGRecord, TXTRecord, UNKRecord
public abstract class Record
extends Object
implements Cloneable

The base class that all records are derived from.

newRecord

public static Record newRecord(Name name,
                               short type,
                               short dclass)
Creates a new empty record, with the given parameters. This method is designed to create records that will be added to the QUERY section of a message.
Returns:
An object of a type extending Record

getType

public short getType()
Returns record's type
See Also:
Type

getRRsetType

public short getRRsetType()
Returns the type of RRset that this record would belong to. For all types except SIGRecord, this is equivalent to getType().
Returns:
The type of record, if not SIGRecord. If the type is SIGRecord, the type covered is returned.
See Also:
Type, RRset, SIGRecord

getDClass

public short getDClass()
Returns the record's class

getTTL

public int getTTL()
Returns the record's TTL

getWireLength

public short getWireLength()
Returns the length of this record in wire format, based on the last time this record was parsed from data or converted to data. The wire format may or may not be compressed
Returns:
The last known length, or -1 if the record has never been in wire format

equals

public boolean equals(Object arg)
Determines if two Records are identical

public int hashCode()
Generates a hash code based on the Record's data
Overrides:
hashCode in class Object

withName

public Record withName(Name name)
Creates a new record identical to the current record, but with a different name. This is most useful for replacing the name of a wildcard record.
